successes.title: Sword & Plough
successes.description: Sword & Plough is a quadruple bottom line bag company that works with veterans to repurpose military surplus fabric into stylish bags.

Pledges.description: A personal THANK YOU card from the Sword & Plough team on 100% post-consumer recycled paper or a personal e-card thank you note.
SWORD & PLOUGH TEE: Limited edition, screen-printed by Veterans on a 100% Cotton, Made in USA shirt. (shipping to US included)
SWORD & PLOUGH KEY FOB: Keep your keys safe with this limited edition, S&P leather key fob. Sport a casual option with a utilitarian style.(retail: $35, shipping to US included)

SWORD & PLOUGH iPHONE SLEEVE: Repurposed military canvas Iphone sleeve. Protect your phone in style. Cut from tent corners, these sleeves offer a snug, minimalistic approach to phone protection.  Sizes available for iPhone 4 and 5! (retail: $39, shipping to US included)
SWORD & PLOUGH iPAD CASE: Repurposed military canvas, felt and leather iPad case. Protect your iPad in style. Sizes available for iPad 2 and iPad mini. (retail: $69, shipping to US included)

SWORD & PLOUGH SIGNATURE TOTE:  Our Tote is designed for your everyday use from work to the weekend. Beautiful gortex, green cotton canvas and lined with camo material. Tote this durable bag on your shoulder with confidence in its non-slip leather straps and strong base.  (retail: $219, shipping to US included)

SWORD & PLOUGH SIGNATURE TOTE: Our Tote is designed for your everyday use from work to the weekend. Beautiful gortex, green cotton canvas and lined with camo material. Tote this durable bag on your shoulder with confidence in its non-slip leather straps and strong base. (retail: $219, shipping to US included)

SWORD & PLOUGH SIGNATURE TOTE: Our Tote is designed for your everyday use from work to the weekend. Beautiful gortex, green cotton canvas and lined with camo material. Tote this durable bag on your shoulder with confidence in its non-slip leather straps and strong base. (retail: $219, shipping to US included)

SWORD & PLOUGH SIGNATURE MESSENGER BAG:  Two-tone olive and forest green. Perfect for work, college, urban and outdoor adventures. The messenger bag includes a thick leather strap that rests comfortably on shoulders and a built in waterproof, padded laptop sleeve.  (retail: $269, shipping to US included)

SWORD & PLOUGH SIGNATURE MESSENGER BAG: Two-tone olive and forest green. Perfect for work, college, urban and outdoor adventures. The messenger bag includes a thick leather strap that rests comfortably on shoulders and a built in waterproof, padded laptop sleeve. (retail: $269, shipping to US included)

SWORD & PLOUGH SIGNATURE URBAN RUCK:  Our signature piece and the "go to" bag in military – the rucksack! Two-tone olive and forest green. A beautifully hand-crafted unisex backpack for all occasions. Made from gortex sleeping bags, canvas tents, parachutes and accented with local Colorado leather. Includes padded shoulder straps, a nylon parachute cinch to ensure your gear will stay dry, and a waterproof laptop sleeve (retail: $289, shipping to US included)

SWORD & PLOUGH SIGNATURE URBAN RUCK: Our signature piece and the "go to" bag in military – the rucksack! Two-tone olive and forest green. A beautifully hand-crafted unisex backpack for all occasions. Made from gortex sleeping bags, canvas tents, parachutes and accented with local Colorado leather. Includes padded shoulder straps, a nylon parachute cinch to ensure your gear will stay dry, and a waterproof laptop sleeve (retail: $289, shipping to US included)
ALL THREE SIGNATURE S&P BAGS PLUS your choice of a professional photo shoot in NYC and your chance to model for Sword & Plough OR the opportunity to help us design our next product!

HERO PACKAGE: This pledge is awesome! Not only will you receive EVERY single S&P reward, but you will also get to name a new S&P product after yourself or the hero of your choosing, leaving your or their mark in Sword & Plough's history.
